title: [K-12] Mobile Microlearning Course on Cell Concepts for Students with Visual Impairments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biological terminology and science learning experience
context.additional_context: Personalized learning environment configuration using individual devices, with a focus on tactile and auditory materials.

learning_goals: Students can explain the basic structures of a cell (cell membrane, cytoplasm, nucleus) with 80% accuracy using 3D-printed cell models.
Students can present three or more comparisons between animal and plant cells by referencing voice explanations from a mobile app.
Students will achieve at least 70% understanding of concepts related to cellular functions through 6 weeks of formative assessments.

resources: Mobile App with Embedded Voice Explanations

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
